lines.text: How's it going, Washington?
I don't know. My name's Mohammed.
We have returned to re-establish our presence!

We have come back. Come back to the world that has always been ours. You have no place in it. You cannot defend yourselves. Our civilization does not accept intruders. We have returned to re-establish our presence. You have violated our world, and therefore you must be punished. All of you will be executed! All of you, except one...
He means me - we hit it off right away!
It's the judgment! God is gonna make us pay for our sins... He paid! And we're gonna pay.
Say, Colonel, when are we going to see your face?
You have no reason to see my face.
Oh, yeah? Do you still live at 12 West 58th Street?
How do you know?
[Walks away whistling]
Hell of a welcoming committee!
Yeah, but what do we have to welcome them with?

[Examining the gun chamber]
Sure as hell don't have enough, just three rounds...
Don't look like no advanced civilization to me - just a bunch of trees!
If you ask me, we're just heading around in circles.
What's wrong with circles?
Well, since I don't have old Allah watching over my sweet ass, I'd feel a lot better if I knew we were heading for dry land, you know.
Oh, your damn thoughts don't go north of your neck anyhow!
Hell, I thought you said there was nothing to it!
Yeah, well I'm just trying to remember the nothing, all right?
We're gonna be running as soon as I open up that hatch.
I've been running all my life!
It's terrible, Mike. It's like living something unreal.
Unfortunately, it's all very true.

[examining stone tablet]
It's fantastic. I've never seen anything like it. Where did you find it?

Five thousand, seven hundred-and-twelve feet down. The spectograph makes it about twelve-thousand-years-old, a lot older than anything you'd ever dig up in Mazzedland! And we've gotten you here to decipher the inscriptions on that tablet!
What's going on here? Who are you?

Of course, I'm sorry. I'm Professor Saunders, Peter Saunders, nuclear physics. A couple of years ago, a Russian sub armed with nuclear missiles foundered right underneath this rig. We're going to float it.
What's this got to do with it?

[shrugs]
Well, that's what we're hoping you'll tell us...
Can't move... we're immobilized!
It's a good thing that island is where we want to go, because it's pulling us in like a kid pulling a kite!
